description.en: The houses of villa rusticae that originate from the ancient age can be found in the surroundings of Donje Selo, on Rogač in the part of Banja, Gornje Selo (Starine) and in the Nečujam's bay called Piškera. The one in Piškera also had a thermal bath. The translation of villa rusticae is a country villa, and they were homes of the roman landowners. They would live in the main house, which would be surrounded by agricultural areas.
description.sr: Kuće vile rustike koje potiču iz antičkog doba mogu se naći u okolini Donjeg Sela, na Rogaču u predelu Banje, Gornjeg Sela (Starine) i u nečujamskoj uvalici Piškeri. U svom sastavu ova vila imala je i kupatilo. Pojam villa rusticae može se prevesti kao vila na selu, a one su bile dom rimskih zemljoposednika. Oni su živeli u glavnoj kući koja je bila okružena poljoprivrednim površinama.

description.en: The fortress Starine, which has two towers, originates from the antient times. It is situated at the foot of Vela Straža (the highest point of the island), near Gornje Selo. In Gornje Selo, you can also find ancient graves, as well as the remains of an ancient sarcophagus at the graveyard (the location called Stomorja).
description.sr: Tvrđava Starine sa dve kule potiče iz antičkog vremena. Nalazi se u podnožju Vele straže (najvišeg vrha ostrva), nedaleko od Gornjeg Sela. Ovde se nalaze i antički grobovi, kao i ostaci antičkog sarkofaga na groblju (lokalitet Stomorja).

description.en: There is an ancient pond on the part of Sholta called Nečujam, at the bottom of the smallest bay. In the 4th century the empire Diocletian chose this bay to be his fish pond. This is why this bay is still called Piškera, and the ruins are still there, at the bottom of the sea. It is said that the empire also had thermal baths here, where he used to come for a bath. This pond is a protected cultural property.
description.sr: Antički ribnjak nalazi se na delu ostrva koji se zove Nečujam, na dnu najmanje uvale. U 4.veku car Dioklecijan izabrao je tu uvalu kao svoj ribnjak. Zato je toj uvalici i dalje ime Piškera, a ruševine su još tu, na dnu mora. Priča se da je Dioklecijan tu imao i terme gde je dolazio na kupanje. Ovaj ribnjak je zaštićeno kulturno dobro.
